skillTree.localised_description: Furtive, scheming, sly, cunning, underhand, devious, conniving, double-dealing, and sneaky - valuable traits if you wish to stay alive!
All Skaven are unprincipled and untrustworthy by their foul natures. However, this is rarely a disadvantage in the face of the enemy.
Some of the chemicals developed by Clan Vrrtkin go towards making their soldiers better, rather than enemy soldiers deader.

effects.description:
Range: +5% for Globadier, Bombardier, Poisoned Wind Mortar, and Globeclaw Catapult units
	(Hero's army)

Reload time reduction: +5% for for Globadier, Bombardier, Poisoned Wind Mortar, and Globeclaw Catapult units
	(Hero's army)

	(Hero's army)

	(Hero's army)

Reload time reduction: +15% for for Globadier, Bombardier, Poisoned Wind Mortar, and Globeclaw Catapult units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: One good thing about training those beneath you - they charge into combat before you do!

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +1 for Globadier, Bombardier, Poisoned Wind Mortar, and Globeclaw Catapult units
	(Hero's army)

Upkeep: -3% for Globadier, Bombardier, Poisoned Wind Mortar, and Globeclaw Catapult units
	(Hero's army)

	(Hero's army)

	(Hero's army)

Upkeep: -13% for Globadier, Bombardier, Poisoned Wind Mortar, and Globeclaw Catapult units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: A Master Engineer knows all about firing rates, fields of fire and the best ratios, his knowledge improving efficiency.

effects.description:
Reload time reduction: +8% for all Missile units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The fact that the Warlock Engineers sell to all sides in the constant Skaven struggle for dominance is well-known; the fact that for a very high price they offer to withhold their services is widely guessed.
Death is always just a shot away.
Engineers use number-lore to work out the best trajectories and prime killing arcs for their war machines.
"It's got a few secret ingredients. No, I won't tell you what they are, but the results will speak for themselves."
"Get more ammo up here, NOW!!!!!!!!"
A clever arrangement of lenses makes the target seem just that bit closer.
Those Engineers conversant in ballistics know how best to increase the ranges of their weapons.
A Sapper excels at breaking entrenched foes. He can quickly get artillery into the best position.

effects.description:
Speed: +3% for all Missile units
	(Hero's army)

Speed: +8% for all Missile units
	(Hero's army)

Speed: +15% for all Missile units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Lenses specially calibrated for the throwing of poisoned wind globes enhances the accuracy of the wearer.

effects.description: Magic item drop chance from battle: +5%
Magic item drop chance from battle: +10%
Magic item drop chance from battle: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: Fight harder my dear rats, protect the globadiers !

attributes.bullet_text:
A Rampaging unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.
	When there are no enemy units nearby, a Rampaging unit will move around randomly instead.
This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

skillTree.localised_description: Those globes will stop pain and temporary mend wounds.
Thanks to artificial receptors in bodies of our troops we can temporaly harden their skin after contact with this addition to mixture.
A Warpstone-enchanted breastplate and a thick steel helmet are useful to protect the wearer from shrapnel.
A powerful discharge of gasses from the warpchemical tank knocks back enemies and envelops them in a cloud of toxic gasses, allowing for a tactical advance to the rear.

ui_effects.localised_text: Units around user will suffer damage over time

skillTree.localised_description: This blade is attached to a Warp-generator that channels crackling energy along the weapon.
The latest invention from the laboratories of Clan Vrrtkin is a chemical means of firing globes. It drastically increases range, at only a small cost to the wearer.
The Skaven utters a vile phrase and belches forth an impossibly gaseous cloud.

target_if: Not on or below a platform
Not on or below a platform
Not on or below a platform

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Gaseous Breath"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Gaseous Breath Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Gaseous Breath Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Poisonous gas fumes are spread as the spells of Gas are cast, infecting the enemy populace with sickness.
A foul gas wraps around the bodies of an allied pack, protecting them and obscuring enemy vision.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Blessed Gas"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Blessed Gas Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Blessed Gas Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: A cloud of gas envelopes enemies, the fumes blinding them

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Blinding Gas"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Blinding Gas Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Blinding Gas Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Behold the Vermintide; the Wizard calls and the rats will answer!

ui_effects.localised_text: Summons a unit of Vrrtkin Clanrats
Summons a unit of Vrrtkin Clanrats

skillTree.localised_description: This particularly unpleasant spell causes a putrid whirlwind of vile gas, melting all living and unliving substance.

target_if: Not on or below a platform
Not on or below a platform

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Whirlwind of Gas"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Whirlwind of Gas Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Whirlwind of Gas Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Splashing acid refined in the toxic factories of Clan Vrrtkin on their enemies, this spell assaults the very fabric of their being, tearing it apart in a fury of destruction.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Acidic Decay"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Acidic Decay Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Acidic Decay Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: Such magic-users may be wise and able to offer sage advice, especially if they have scried the region.

effects.description: Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 2%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 4%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 6%

skillTree.localised_description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

contact_stat_effect.onscreen_name:
Trikstab's Poison Wind Concoction!
	Damage over time

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "I keep them sharp, yes-yes. Always ready for the challenge that I know is coming, yes-yes!"
"When they come for you, go straight for the throat and tear it clean out. They won't come again."
"Most precious of all substances, the pulse of our life."

effects.description:
Upkeep: -12% for Warpfire Thrower, Warp Lightning Cannon and Doomwheel units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.
Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

effects.description: Magic item drop chance from battle: +15%

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.
Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.
